name: Google Apps Script Kickstart for Firebase Studio
description: Jumpstart your Google Apps Script development on Firebase Studio with this collection of starter templates. Designed to boost productivity and ensure high-quality, maintainable code from day one.

options.apps-script-module-template: Modular structure for clean, maintainable Apps Script.
options.apps-script-engine-template: Robust & highly configurable; essential dev tools included.
options.apps-script-starter-template: Minimal & bare-bones; perfect for simple scripts or learning.
